title: Chestnut, leek and mushroom tartlets
description: A vegetarian starter or light lunch for the winter. This makes either four individual tartlets with 10cm/4in loose-bottomed flan rings or one larger one using a 20-22cm/8-9in flan ring.
ingredients: 200g/7oz packed cooked and peeled chestnuts, chopped
2 sprigs fresh rosemary, leaves only, chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
